description: Select a completed design project, prepare high-resolution files, and document scope/objectives before publishing on Behance.

checklist.guide: Ensure project is representative of current portfolio quality.

checklist.item: Project files and assets prepared in high resolution
checklist.guide: Export final assets suitable for Behance presentation.
Confirm that publishing rights and NDAs are respected.
Capture goals, constraints, and key challenges.

success_criteria: Project meets internal portfolio quality standards.
Story of the project can be told end-to-end.
All required assets are prepared for upload.
